TITLE: DREAMTONE Vol. 1 is Now Coming March 11, 2026
CONTENT:
Hi everyone,

DREAMTONE Vol. 1 and its Kickstarter have been postponed to March 11th, 2026.

We're sorry to disappoint, but we appreciate your understanding and patience as we finalize the game. Our goal is still to deliver an amazing first look at DREAMTONE.

While we're as excited as you are to see this released, we realized that our November release date simply didn't give us enough time to make something that lived up to our standards. We're committed to delivering the best possible experience for you, our fans, and that means taking the time necessary to get it right. We're confident that these extra months will result in a demo that exceeds your expectations and leaves you wanting more.

We really can’t wait to share the results of years of hard work with you all.

Thank you for your understanding and continued support!

Sincerely,
the DREAMTONE Team
PREVIEW: We're sorry to disappoint, but we appreciate your understanding and patience as we finalize the game. Our goal is still to deliver an amazing first look at DREAMTONE.
